extension.description: Collection-aware TV show browser. Related shows are collapsed into a single entry in the title listing, just like Kodi's movie collections. Manage collections via context menus. Use as a replacement for library://video/tvshows/titles/ in skin widgets and shortcuts. Supports tag filtering (e.g. plugin://plugin.video.watchorder/?tag=anime).
